DESCRIPTION:

Randal - kleptomaniac, a sociopath and a terrible one. And it's an obvious contender for the title of the rough hero since the invention haverborda. Randal's Monday - it's insane, although very classic journey through space and time, seasoned with a bunch of references to geek culture past 30 years. Randal wakes up after a party to celebrate the engagement of his best friend Matt. In his hands - Matt wallet, but my head -pohmelny fog. In the purse Randal manage to find an engagement ring his friend and, without thinking of the consequences, he decides to sell it. And here it falls on him and a terrible curse. Matt committed suicide and now Randal will repeatedly experience the fateful Monday to find an opportunity to correct his mistake. Randal must be returned to the ring and get my life in order, until everything got worse ... I mean, has not yet ceased to exist very space-time continuum. Attention, geeks! Randal's Monday - a classic Point & Click adventure spiced with excellent black humor and lots of references to popular culture. Truly, this is not a game but a tribute to a whole generation of players, book lovers and film fans who admire retro and contemporary subculture.
